name: 英文（三）：職場英文
comment: *適合中初級程度以上同學修習。
restrict: ◎必須先修過【英文（一）】◎必須先修過【英文（二）】
description: 本課程旨在幫助學生未來工作應具備中初級以上英語水平的英語學習者而設計。商務領域的口語，聽力，閱讀和寫作都將通過求職面試和商務禮儀等主題進行介紹。學生應參加各種活動，學習使用工作場所使用的常用短語。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Objectives:**

The course serves as a general introduction to workplace English. Its primary purpose is to practice four language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in workplace-related subjects. Topics include real-life situations such as job interview, presentation, marketing, and email communication. There will be reinforcement activities and role-playing exercises in class. Students are encouraged to work with their group partners and practice English as much as they can in a learner-friendly environment. 

**Weekly Schedule:**

Week 1    \[Holiday\] No class

Week 2    Course overview

Week 3    Warm-up exercises; Finding a job; Writing a resume and cover letter

Week 4    Writing a resume and cover letter

Week 5    Job interview

Week 6    Job interview

Week 7    Making a presentation

Week 8    Telephoning

Week 9    Midterm exam week

Week 10  \[Sports Day\] No class

Week 11  Trade show

Week 12  Trade show

Week 13  Business travel and business etiquette

Week 14  Email communication: placing an order and arranging shipment

Week 15  Email communication: custom service

Week 16  Final presentation: role-playing of a usual work day

Week 17  Final presentation: role-playing of a usual work day

Week 18  Final Exam Week

**Teaching methods:**

The teacher will prepare the materials for in-class group activities. Each student’s performance in the group activities will be recorded by the teacher. Extra-points will be given to students who share their ideas and thoughts actively.

**Homework:**

Students will be asked to hand in the following written assignments: resume, cover letter, job interview answer cheat sheet, and email correspondences.
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【英文（一）】◎必須先修過【英文（二）】
